messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Phone numbers and Fax numbers for  CBS
messages.msgSnippet: ... If you go to the top of the page, you ll find a button called Contact Us (or something like that).  You can send an email from there.  I did. Tia
messages.messageBody:
>Here are a few way to contact CBS to say what you

If you go to the top of the page, you'll find a button called Contact Us
(or something like that). You can send an email from there. I did.
Tia

messages.subject: Phone numbers and Fax numbers for CBS
messages.msgSnippet: Here are a few way to contact CBS to say what you think about the two CBS news stories on Homeschooling. Vicky Evening@cbsnews.com Here s a CA CBS FAX number:
messages.messageBody:
Here are a few way to contact CBS to say what you
think about the two CBS news stories on
Homeschooling.

Vicky

Evening@...

Here's a CA CBS FAX number: 1-(323) 653-8276

Viacom President and CEO - Mel Karmazin 1-(212) 258-6000
(Viacom is the parent company of CBS)

CBS Evening News - LA Bureau P - (323) 575-2202
